sentences.english: He will shine through your idle thoughts today, and help you understand the truth of love.
sentences.chinese: 他今天会照透你的无谓的杂念，帮你了解爱的真相。

sentences.english: your time spent on text messages and phone calls if they are not related to work.-Keep
sentences.chinese: 不要把时间无谓地花在与工作无关的短信和电话上。

sentences.english: What an earth you are looking for.
sentences.chinese: 无谓的独幕剧中，你在寻找什么。

sentences.english: She was exasperated by the senseless delays.
sentences.chinese: 她被无谓的拖延弄得很恼火。

sentences.english: Love left a position, a little less unnecessary doubts.
sentences.chinese: 给真爱留一个位置，少一点无谓的怀疑。

sentences.english: Symbolically, he coughed to clear his throat.
sentences.chinese: 周经理象征地咳一声无谓的嗽，清清嗓子。

sentences.english: He is honest; he does not like to waste his time and energy.
sentences.chinese: 他是诚实的，他不会无谓的浪费他的时间和精力。

sentences.english: So time does not slip away meaninglessly.
sentences.chinese: 于是时光不会无谓的流逝。

sentences.english: When I focus on living, all those other fake needs become less important.
sentences.chinese: 当我热爱生活时，那些无谓的虚妄会变得丝毫不重要。

sentences.english: Among the nonsense tragedies, what you are looking for.
sentences.chinese: 无谓的独幕剧中，你在寻找什么。

sentences.english: I not said that the senseless idle word, this causes me to think clear smooth.
sentences.chinese: 我不多说无谓的闲言，这使我觉得清畅。

sentences.english: But we must use it discreetly, and not waste powder for nothing.
sentences.chinese: 但我们要谨慎地运用，不要滥用好像无谓地浪费火药。

sentences.english: Control your time spent on text messages and phone calls if they are not related to work.
sentences.chinese: 不要把时间无谓地花在与事变无关的短信和德律风上。

sentences.english: It drives out of this world a god who had come into it with dissatisfaction and a preference for futile sufferings.
sentences.chinese: 它将那个带来不满和无谓苦难的神祗逐出了凡间。

sentences.english: My dear friend, does not like me piddling away my time in the meaningless annoyance.
sentences.chinese: 朋友，不要像我这样，在无谓的烦恼中蹉跎了时光。

definition: to ask for trouble (idiom)/to make a rod for one's own back
to be in a tangle/to nag
to bother about/to haggle/to bicker/to argue/plan/stratagem
to look forward and back/to consider prudently/overcautious
need not/does not have to/not necessarily
